description: This stores Leave of Absence updates that occur after the event started.

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the event record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LOA_UPD_DATE
columns.description: When there's a change to leave of absence reason, this records the date that it occurred.

columns.name: LOA_UPD_TM
columns.description: When there's a change to leave of absence reason, this records the time that it occurred.

columns.name: LOA_UPD_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
When there's a change to leave of absence reason, this records the reason that it changed to.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LOA_UPD_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: When there's a change to leave of absence reason, this records the instant that the user made the update.

columns.name: LOA_UPD_USER_ID
columns.description: When there's a change to leave of absence reason, this records the user that made the update.
